name: Kids Mayan Adventure
description:
Five Mayan friends in the Classic period (c. 250-900 AD) was playing in the forest, when they came across a cave they haven’t explored before.
Old stories from the Preclassic period (c. 2000 BC – 250 AD) mentions a secretly hidden and mysterious cave where the first mayan king have hidden the mayan kingdoms coins and gemstones.
And now these five friends seems to have found this mysterious cave. But this cave have many secretly hidden but dangerous obstacles.

How many coins and gemstones can you collect before you die?

Game Control:
You control the friends character left/right/up and down, while they are hanging on a rope.

Only available on Apple App Store !
